title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Simulation Game-Based Approach for Enhancing Managerial Decision-Making Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Core business administration theories and mathematical problem-solving capabilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through simulation games reflecting real business scenarios, learners can apply strategic decision-making processes with over 80% accuracy
Learners independently design three or more solutions to business problems using in-game mathematical modeling tools
Based on simulation results, learners propose decision-making improvement strategies through two or more formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
